summary: Fixes the lighting for Chandeliers in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Fixes the lighting for Chandeliers in Whiterun.
The lightsource was originally beneith the lights which casted the shadow in the wrong directions. I readjusted all of the light sources for a more realistic feel. I don\'t know about anyone else, but seeing the Chandelier shadow on the ceiling really bugged me for quite a while.

Very small and doesn\'t change much except the location of the light source.


Fixed 14 Chandeliers in the following locations:
WhiterunWarmaidens
WhiterunDragonsreachJarlsQuarters
HonningbrewMeadery01
WhiterunJorrvaskr
WhiterunGuardsHouse
WhiterunJorrvaskrBasement
WhiterunHalloftheDead
WhiterunSeverioPelagaisHouse
WhiterunDragonsreachBasement
WhiterunBreezehome


Current change log:
Version 1.01
    Updated fmod to include website for updating with Mod Manager. 
Version 1.0
    Initial Release
author: CloudD901

files.name: Whiterun Chandelier Fix
files.changelogHtml: Updated fmod to include website for updating with Mod Manager.
